instruments.en: We welcome you! Your reliable assistant in solving learning tasks is StudentHelper! üìö To select the operating mode, simply click on the buttons below. üòäüîß

code_helper.en:
Hello! Welcome to StudentHelper, your personal assistant in writing and editing code. I'm glad to assist you.

Dear user!

To provide effective help in solving your code issue, please provide the following information:

‚Ä¢ Programming language.
‚Ä¢ Purpose and functionality of the code.
‚Ä¢ The code you have written (even if it does not work).
‚Ä¢ Description of the specific problem (errors, incorrect results).
‚Ä¢ Descriptions of your attempts to find a solution (search results).

I can help with debugging, algorithm development, code optimization, concept explanations, and tool recommendations.

chart_creator_helper.en: Hello! StudentHelper welcomes you, your personal assistant in building various types of graphs, I am glad to welcome you. In order for me to solve your problem, you need to click the 'Plot a graph' button

chart_creator_rules.en:
Tell me which graph to plot, and I‚Äôll send it to you.

You can specify the function and boundaries for the x-axis [x from -1 to 1] and the y-axis [y from -1 to 1].

üìà I can draw the following graphs:
- graph of a linear function (y=a*x+b)
- graph of a quadratic function (y=a*x^2+b*x+c)
- graph of a cubic function (y=x^3)
- graph of higher-degree polynomial functions (y=a*x^3+b*x^2+c*x+d)
- graph of a square root function (y=sqrt(x))
- graph of a hyperbola (y=1/x)
- graph of an exponential function (y=exp(1)^x)
- graph of a logarithmic function (y=log(x))
- graph of trigonometric functions (y=sin(x), y=cos(x), y=tan(x), y=cot(x))
- graph of inverse trigonometric functions (y=arcsin(x), y=arccos(x), y=arctan(x), y=arccot(x))

üîªRules for entering functions:
1. All variables are expressed through x
2. All mathematical operations are expressed using standard symbols +, -, *, /, ^
3. Square root ‚àö¬Ø ‚â° sqrt, root degree ‚â° x^(2/3), (x-1)^(1/3)
Number œÄ ‚â° pi, number e ‚â° exp(1), ‚àû ‚â° infinity
e^x = exp(x), log5(x) ‚â° log(x,5)
4. Trigonometric functions: cos(x), sin(x), tan(x), cot(x), arccos(x), arcsin(x), arctan(x), arccot(x)

chart_creator_done_chart.en:
Your function has been plotted‚úÖ.


Thank you for choosing our Service!
Best regards, Team @student_helpergpt_botüë®‚Äçüíª.





‚ùóThe solution is not the final result and may require adjustments.

pptx_helper_welcome.en: Hello! Welcome to StudentHelper, your personal assistant in creating presentations, I am glad to welcome you. In order for me to create a presentation for you, you need to click the 'Generate presentation' button.

pptx_helper_topic_request.en:
Great! Describe the topic of  a Presentation you want to generate.
For example: 'The World of dinosaurs'

rewriting_helper.en:
Hello! You are welcomed by StudentHelper, your personal assistant in üí¨ To unify the text, I will change the content of the text for you without changing its essence.
Send the document in the format.txt or .docx

rewriting_finish.en:
üìù Your work is ready.

You can download the file with your work below.

Thank you for choosing our service!

Best regards,
The @student_helpergpt_bot teamüë®‚Äçüíª.

‚ùóThe file is not the final result and requires further revision.

essay_helper.en:
Great! Describe the topic of The Essay you want to generate.
For example: 'The World of dinosaurs'

course_work_helper_welcome.en:
Great! Describe the topic of a Term Paper you want to generate.
For example: ¬´The World of dinosaurs¬ª

essay_helper_welcome.en: Hello! Welcome to StudentHelper, your personal assistant in writing Papers, I am glad to welcome you. All texts will be provided strictly with high uniqueness and according to GOST. It is important to understand that the presented materials are a starting point and require further improvement to meet all the necessary criteria.

abstract_helper_welcome.en: Hello! Welcome to StudentHelper, your personal assistant in writing Papers, I am glad to welcome you. All texts will be provided strictly with high uniqueness and according to GOST. It is important to understand that the presented materials are a starting point and require further improvement to meet all the necessary criteria

abstract_helper.en:
Great! Describe the topic of Paper you want to generate.
For example: 'Animal World'

select_generation_mode.en:
Perfectly!
Select the generation mode.1) In automatic mode, you will receive the finished work on the topic you specified.
2) In the planned mode, the neural network will generate work strictly acting according to your plan.

abstract_manual_plan.en:
At this stage, it is necessary to form the correct work structure. For this, you need to send me a plan, composed as follows:

* Chapter
+ Sub-chapter
- Item
- Item
+ Sub-chapter
- Item
- Item

And so on...

confirm_plan_action.en:
Great!
We confirm the generation:

One generation will be deducted from your balance!

course_work_helper.en: Hello! Welcome to StudentHelper, your personal assistant in writing a Term Papers, I am glad to welcome you. All texts will be provided strictly with high uniqueness and according to GOST. It is important to understand that the presented materials are a starting point and require further improvement to meet all the necessary criteria.

work_done.en:
üìùThe job is ready.

You can download the file with the work below.

Thank you for choosing our Service!

With respect,
The @student_helpergpt_botüë®üíª team.
